api_list.name: Get All Users
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pulsar6.p.rapidapi.com/user"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pulsar6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Metadado
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pulsar6.p.rapidapi.com/metadado"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pulsar6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
